About Me

Hi there! I’m Heer Patel, a final year Diploma student at MS University of Baroda. I learn about things that intrigue me, mostly teaching myself throughout. My current interests are in the field of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning.

I’m currently working through Practical Deep Learning for Coders by fast.ai


Feel free to contact me if our interests align or well, there doesn’t have to be a reason :3
